thread.title: Robot avatar Walk-Man debuts slimmer, quicker physique

title: Robot avatar Walk-Man debuts slimmer, quicker physique
text:
Robot avatar Walk-Man debuts slimmer, quicker physique Thursday, March 08, 2018 - 01:27 
A new and improved version of the humanoid robot Walk-Man is tested as a robotic avatar for supporting emergency response teams, as Matthew Stock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A new and improved version of the humanoid robot Walk-Man is tested as a robotic avatar for supporting emergency response teams, as Matthew Stock reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2oY2Zf1
